name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior ML Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Machine Learning**, **AI**, and **Data Science** for high-performance systems across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **MLOps** methodologies, leveraging tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for model training, serving, and orchestration. Solid background in **Cloud Computing** with hands-on expertise deploying solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**. Experienced in developing applications that utilize real-time and batch processing techniques, ensuring high code quality and robust production monitoring.

Technically skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a comprehensive understanding of frontend and backend technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms focused on predictive analytics and automation. Familiar with compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, ensuring governance in development practices.

experience.responsibilities:

• Implemented and managed **MLOps** workflows using **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Airflow** to streamline model training, validation, and deployment pipelines, ensuring high standards of **Code Quality** across development and production environments.
• Designed and carried out robust testing strategies using **Jest**, **Cypress**, **Postman**, and **PyTest**, establishing comprehensive unit, integration, E2E, and contract-level tests for quality assurance.
• Developed high-performance systems for real-time processing and batch processing, ensuring optimized data handling and analysis in both healthcare and fintech domains.
• Built and maintained cloud-native infrastructure on platforms such as **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring compliance with governance standards and enabling scalable deployments using **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and serverless functions.
• Integrated production monitoring tools and practices to ensure system reliability and performance, reinforcing governance and regulatory compliance throughout the development lifecycle.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance data ingestion and visualization capabilities using tools like **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **D3.js**, providing insights into financial activities, fraud trends, and operational KPIs.
• Delivered mobile applications for **iOS** and **Android** utilizing **Flutter** and **React Native**, ensuring secure, real-time user interactions and efficient state management with **Provider** and **Redux**.
• Developed CI/CD pipelines tailored for mobile applications with **Fastlane** and **App Center**, incorporating automated testing and monitoring, along with crash analytics using **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry**.
• Integrated intelligent features into applications using **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**, enhancing user experience with personalized dashboards and predictive health alerts.
• Modernized legacy systems through microservice architecture design and implementation, ensuring fault tolerance and scalability to meet user demands.

Utilized **Machine Learning** techniques to build and deploy fraud detection models using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, achieving a **95% accuracy** rate in identifying suspicious transactions.
Implemented **MLOps** strategies to create ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, with a focus on model governance and monitoring.
Designed **cloud computing** solutions on **Azure** for developing and maintaining robust ETL pipelines, effectively processing over **1 million records per day** for financial data ingestion.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability and performance for **high-volume transactional systems**.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, reducing response times by **30%**.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces, leading to improved user engagement.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows, such as payments and alerts, enhancing system efficiency.
Implemented production monitoring and code quality checks to maintain high standards and ensure seamless deployment processes across all projects.

• Leveraged **Machine Learning** and **AI** methodologies to enhance product offerings and customer experiences through personalized recommendations, optimizing search relevance, and improving conversion rates using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**.
• Engineered high-performance systems for real-time processing, implementing fast and scalable **distributed data storage** solutions with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra**, ensuring up to **99.99% availability** under peak load.
• Developed and optimized **high-performance** backend services for a **global e-commerce** platform using **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**) and **Node.js** (**NestJS**, **Express**), maintaining low latency for nearly **50 million** transactions annually.
• Designed and executed rigorous testing frameworks and quality assurance practices to uphold code quality and deployment standards, facilitating continuous integration and delivery processes.
• Integrated **Cloud Computing** solutions for scalable deployments and production monitoring, applying effective governance policies to manage **Kubernetes** environments for efficient operations.
• Implemented real-time order processing and updates using **WebSockets**, event-driven architecture, and messaging platforms like **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, leading to a **30% decrease** in order fulfillment times.
• Applied comprehensive monitoring strategies and production metrics to detect anomalies and performance bottlenecks, contributing to enhanced system resilience and responsiveness.
• Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs with **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG **2.1**) for improved user engagement.
• Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI-compliant handling of sensitive data to protect user transactions.
• Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** to facilitate controlled rollouts during platform updates, minimizing risk and enhancing user experience.
